revision.text: Possibly: A View of Society and Manners in France, Switzerland, and Germany: with anecdotes relating to some Eminent Characters. By a Gentleman, Who resided several Years in those Countries. In Two Volumes. (By John Moore). (London : Printed for W. Strahan; and T. Cadell, in the Strand, MDCCLXXIX. [1779]) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2430253~S1
